item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (771 points | 578 comments)
2. Git-absorb: Git commit –fixup, but automatic (112 points | 47 comments)
3. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (420 points | 135 comments)

21. Clara (YC S24) Is Hiring a Head of Growth ( | hide)

27. System Intiative is generally available (97 points | 64 comments)

29. Show HN: Coros – A Modern C++ Library for Task Parallelism (81 points | 43 comments)
